name: I'm a beetle!
description:
I'M A BEETLE is a role-playing text adventure in which you, a lab technician, have turned yourself into a giant mutant beetle after a science experiment gone wrong.  Now you must find a way to turn yourself back without being noticed.

This is my first ever game and I made this entirely by myself, using Unity.  I am hoping to make even more games in future.  I hope you enjoy my first attempt at games design/development and I appreciate any feedback you have.

This game is for desktop only, although I am considering making a mobile version.
